author: Toni Shope
text:
The City of Virginia Beach is interested in records management related job titles and descriptions.  If you have a formal records management program, can you please share your job titles and their related descriptions.  Additionally, what is the scope of your program?  Do you handle records management for only city departments, or do you also cover the school district and courts as well?
Please send responses to Stephanie Klinkenberger  muiniref@vbgov.com
title: Records Management Job Titles and Descriptions
